_sText:
Map Info
===========
*cs_hotel
*Counter-Strike Source
*By Derek "aliceschain" Braun
North Dakota, USA


mail: aliceschain@gmail.com
AIM: dissentone

Description:
===========
A hotel on the outskirts of town has been seized by a rogue group of terrorists. Rescue the hostages inside and guide them to safety. There are many entrance points in the map and a few different ways to vacate the hot zones which should hopefully make the gameplay less static and more interesting. In the hallways,  close quartered combat is an issue, so a shotgun may be beneficial in this map. However, because of how big the map is any gun and play style should certainly work. 

Special Thanks:
===========
Mike Reinerz, Bill Koch (beta testing)
Samuel Villareal (guidance)
